screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize_org = self["text"].getSize()
textwidth_add = 20 textsize = (textsize_org[0] + textwidth_add, textsize_org[1] + textwidth_add)
offset_listposx = 20 offset_listposy = 27 offset_listwidth = 12 offset_listheight = 30 offset_textwidth = 73 offset_textheight = 12 min_width = 400 min_height = 60 textwidth = textsize[0] textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width
if (listheight > 0): offset = 34 else: offset = 24
if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = offset_textwidth + textwidth + offset_listposx * 2 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_textwidth wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if ((wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx) >deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset - offset_listposy + offset_listposx wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_textwidth - offset_listposx * 2 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex,wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth,textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2,listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx,textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2,int(deskheight - newheight)/2 + 25))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (32, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (45, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 1), size = (65, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 1), size = (200, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (325, 1), size = (300, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (696, 3), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (32, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (40, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45, 1), size = (65, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 1), size = (196, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (316, 1), size = (300, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (696, 3), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (420, 23), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 30), size = (410, 23), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 30), size = (230, 23), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD", 21), gFont("SetrixHD", 19), gFont("SetrixHD", 16)], "itemHeight": 70 }
